quest.manual: Nachdem du $npcName:23090005$ besiegt hast, betritt $map:52000014$, um den Fluch auf dem Gegenstand $item:15500064$ zu brechen.

quest.name: Dunkelheit in der Dunkelheit
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001242$ interessiert sich sehr für den Gegenstand $item:30000560$. Er hat eine Hypothese darüber, wie man den Fluch lösen kann. Um diese zu testen, bittet er dich, einen aus verdichteter Dunkelheit geformten Kristall zu finden.
Finde den Gegenstand $item:30000437$ beim $map:2000350$ und bringe ihn zu $npcName:11001242$.

quest.name: Dunkelheit in der Dunkelheit
quest.desc:
$npcName:11001242$ interessiert sich sehr für den Gegenstand $item:30000561$. Er hat eine Hypothese darüber, wie man den Fluch lösen kann. Um diese zu testen, bittet er dich, einen aus verdichteter Dunkelheit geformten Kristall zu finden.
Finde den Gegenstand $item:30000437$ beim $map:2000350$ und bringe ihn zu $npcName:11001242$.
quest.complete: Sprich mit dem exzentrischen $npcName:11001242$ im Gebiet $map:3000024$.

quest.name: Machtkampf
quest.desc: $npcName:11001242$ konnte den unheilvollen Fluch auf der Waffe von $npcName:23090005$ brechen. Doch er sagte auch, das sei nicht genug; du sollst dich zur $map:02000203$ begeben und die Waffe umschmieden. Bringe den Gegenstand $item:15500064$ zu $npcName:11001211$ auf der $map:02000203$.

quest.name: Machtkampf
quest.desc: $npcName:11001242$ konnte den unheilvollen Fluch auf der Waffe von $npcName:23090005$ brechen. Doch er sagte auch, das sei nicht genug, du sollst dich zur $map:02000203$ begeben und die Waffe umschmieden. Bringe den Gegenstand $item:15600064$ zu $npcName:11001211$ auf der $map:02000203$.

quest.name: Ein unerwarteter Hinweis
quest.desc: Ein Schamane aus der $map:02000203$ hat $npcName:11001211$ erzählt, dass man zum Lösen eines mächtigen Fluches eines Dämons in dessen Bewusstsein eindringen muss. Finde $npcName:23090005$ und triff dich mit $npcName:11001485$, der zum $map:02000200$ gegangen ist.

quest.desc: Ein Schamane aus der $map:02000203$ hat $npcName:11001211$ erzählt, dass man zum Lösen eines mächtigen Fluches eines Dämons in dessen Bewusstsein eindringen muss. Finde $npcName:23090005$ und triff dich mit $npcName:11001485$, der zum $map:02000200$ gegangen ist.

Bezwinge $npcName:23090005$ und betritt $map:52000014$, um eine Möglichkeit zu finden, den Fluch zu brechen.
quest.manual: Nachdem du $npcName:23090005$ besiegt hast, betritt $map:52000014$, um den Fluch auf dem Gegenstand $item:15500064$ zu brechen.

quest.desc: $npcName:11001485$ sagt, um den Fluch eines mächtigen Dämons wie $npcName:23090005$ brechen zu können, musst du in sein Bewusstsein eindringen, während er geschwächt ist. Bezwinge $npcName:23090005$ und betritt $map:52000014$, um eine Möglichkeit zu finden, den Fluch zu brechen.
quest.manual: Nachdem du $npcName:23090005$ besiegt hast, betritt $map:52000014$, um den Fluch auf dem Gegenstand $item:15500064$ zu brechen.

quest.name: Balrogs Blut
quest.desc: Du hast den sogenannten unvergänglichen $npcName:23090005$ besiegt und einen Tropfen $item:30000419$ erhalten. Der Gegenstand strahlt eine finstere Aura aus – und du kannst spüren, dass sich in seinem Innern eine große Kraft befindet. Möglicherweise kann dir $npcName:11000144$ mehr darüber erzählen.
quest.complete: Triff $npcName:11000144$ am $map:02000173$ und erkundige dich nach dem Gegenstand $item:30000419$.

quest.name: Gelehrter des Lebens
quest.desc: $npcName:11000144$ ist nicht dafür ausgerüstet, um das Blut eines unvergänglichen Monsters zu untersuchen. Er empfiehlt dir, $npcName:11001210$ in $map:02000023$ aufzusuchen, der als Koryphäe in Bezug auf Lebensmagie gilt.
quest.complete: Sprich mit $npcName:11001210$ in $map:02000023$ und finde mehr über $item:30000419$ heraus.

quest.name: Wahre Natur
quest.desc: $npcName:11001210$ befindet sich in einer Art Schockzustand, nachdem klar geworden ist, dass $item:30000419$ den Gesetzen der Natur und der Sterblichkeit zu trotzen scheint. Es ist zweifellos die Quelle einer großen Kraft ... Aber gleichsam nutzlos für dich, solange das Böse darin nicht ausgetrieben wird. Frage $npcName:11001210$, ob er dir helfen kann, es zu läutern.
quest.manual: Gib $npcName:11001210$ $item:30000419$, damit es gereinigt werden kann.

quest.name: Schmied von Nerman
quest.desc: $npcName:11001210$ hat $item:30000419$ gereinigt, wodurch nur noch $item:30000420$ zurückbleibt. Er empfiehlt dir, den Schmied Harcha in der $map:02000203$ aufzusuchen, der dir möglicherweise helfen kann, das Material zu einer Waffe zu schmieden.

quest.name: Unendliche Essenz
quest.desc:
Der Urgroßvater von $npcName:11001211$, Harcha, überlieferte das Wissen einer alten Schmiedekunst, mit deren Hilfe es möglich ist, Waffen herzustellen, die in der Maple-World noch nie zuvor gesehen wurden. Um dies zu tun, benötigt er allerdings $itemPlural:30000421$ und $itemPlural:30000420$.
$itemPlural:30000421$ kannst du möglicherweise von den Allicari in $map:2000064$ erhalten.
quest.complete: Liefere die $itemPlural:30000420$ und die $itemPlural:30000421$ bei $npcName:11001211$ in der $map:02000203$ ab.

quest.name: Donalds Einladung
quest.desc: $npcName:11003870$ hat dich ins Gebiet $map:02000424$ gerufen. Sprich mit $npcName:11000454$ in der Taverne $map:02000069$, um dorthin zu gelangen.

quest.name: Geschichten des Meeres
quest.desc: Gerade als du dachtest, $npcName:11000454$ würde dich mit seinen endlosen Geschichten zu Tode langweilen, sagte er dir, dass $npcName:11000981$ den Weg ins Gebiet $map:02000424$ kennt.

quest.name: Zur Schimmersteininsel
quest.desc: Da du mit $npcName:11000454$ befreundet bist, möchte dich $npcName:11000981$ ins Gebiet $map:02000424$ bringen.

quest.name: Donalds Bitte
quest.desc: $npcName:11003870$ auf der $map:02000424$ muss dich um einen Gefallen bitten. Bring den Gegenstand $item:30001128$ zu den Minenarbeitern – aber sag ihnen nicht, von wem er kommt!

quest.name: Immer etwas zu tun
quest.desc: Gerade als du auf dem Weg bist, zu $npcName:11003870$ zurückzukehren, nimmt dich $npc:11003871$ zur Seite. Er hat eine weitere Aufgabe.

quest.name: Immer willkommen
quest.desc: $npcName:11003872$ dankt dir und bittet dich, das Gebiet $map:02000424$ öfter zu besuchen.

quest.name: Alkimis Einladung
quest.desc: $npcName:11000005$ von der Akimigilde (die sich, wie du schon richtig vermutet hast, mit Alchemie beschäftigt) hat dich eingeladen, die $map:02000425$ besuchen. Triff dich mit $npcName:11003876$ in der Taverne $map:02000069$, um Reisevorbereitungen zu treffen.

quest.name: Loana, die Matrosin
quest.desc: $npcName:11003876$ sagt, dass die $map:02000425$ ein wundervoller Ort ist.

quest.name: Auf zur Alkimiinsel
quest.desc: $npcName:11003877$ hat die Seeroute zur $map:02000425$ geöffnet.

quest.name: Essenslieferung
quest.desc: $npcName:11003878$ hat vergessen, das Mittagessen an den Verwalter der $map:02000425$ zu schicken. Übernimm diese Aufgabe für sie.

quest.name: Unkraut jäten
quest.desc: Du musst das Essenspaket von $npcName:11003879$ zurückbekommen. $npcName:11003879$ bittet dich, Unkraut zu jäten, solange er isst.

quest.name: Danke für das Essen
quest.desc: Dank dir konnte $npcName:11003879$ in Ruhe sein Mittagessen genießen. Nimm die leere Lunchbox von $npcName:11003879$ und bringe sie $npcName:11003878$ zurück.

quest.name: Starving Refugees
quest.desc: $npc:11004574$ said the only way to get food for the refugees is hunting the animals in the vicinity. But the mechanical lifeforms are attacking the refugees and giving them a hard time in hunting. $npc:11004574$ is worried that refugees will collapse from starvation if this goes on. Defeat $npcName:25022203$ in $map:02020066$, $npcName:25022305$ in $map:02020067$, and $npcName:25022408$ in $map:02020068$.

quest.name: Changed Poing
quest.desc: $npc:11004620$ is wallowing in grief as the furious Poings are harming the Leshies. It must be the Poing exposed to aetherine mentioned by $npcName:11004614$. If you face the first Poing, the second and third appear to help. As you face the three, they combine into the 'Three Poing Brothers'. $npcName:11004620$ said the combined 'Three Poing Brothers' are very strong and the Leshies can't go against them. They must be stopped before there are more sacrifices with the Leshies. Defeat $npcName:25022805$ in $map:02020068$ and $npcName:25022815$ in $map:02020069$.

quest.name: Tairen's Intervention
quest.desc: The Tairen forces are attacking the residents of $map:02020066$. $npcName:11004574$ said Tairen wouldn't have attacked if Humanitas never came. You need to defeat the Tairen forces to build more trust with the refugees. Defeat $npcName:25022200$, $npcName:25022201$, and $npcName:25022204$ in $map:02020066$.

quest.name: Loathing and Revenge
quest.desc: $npc:11004574$ said only one out of the five that went hunting returned. The last one was kidnapped, but was released to make the refugees fear Kharon. Such atrocity by Kharon can't be allowed anymore. Defeat $npcName:25022300$, $npcName:25022306$, $npcName:25022303$, $npcName:25022301$, and $npcName:25022307$ in $map:02020067$.

quest.name: Reason for the Forest Being Tainted Black
quest.desc: $npc:11004620$ said $map:02020068$ is being tainted black because of the Daemon Army. The forest along with the lifeforms are being encroached by the dark power. $npcName:11004620$ said the lifeforms encroached by the dark power are under the Daemon Army's control. He said they are being encroached because the Daemon Army is trying to steal the 'mysterious power' of the Leshies... Defeat $npcName:25022406$, $npcName:25022409$, and $npcName:25022402$ in $map:02020068$.

quest.name: One Who Protects
quest.desc: $npcName:11004620$ said the Daemon Army is tainting the lifeforms of $map:02020069$ black. The lifeforms encroached by the dark power are under the control of the Daemon Army. He's sure they were encroached because the Daemon Army wants to steal the 'mysterious power' of the Leshies. Defeat $npcName:25022500$, $npcName:25022503$, and $npcName:25022502$ in $map:02020069$.

quest.name: Refugees in Panic
quest.desc: $npc:11004574$ said it's a matter of time until $map:02020066$ falls. It's because the new Kharon commanders are kidnapping refugees all over the place. If this goes on, Galan will be striken by fear and collapse from within. Defeat $npcName:25022801$ in $map:02020066$ and $npcName:25022811$ in $map:02020067$.

quest.name: Monsters Created by Kharon
quest.desc: $npc:11004574$ said no is hunting because of the beasts released by Kharon. Many of the residents who went hunting came back injured as they were attacked by the beasts. The beasts of Kharon have to be suppressed to free the refugees from hunger. Defeat $npcName:25022208$ in $map:02020066$ and $npcName:25022307$ in $map:02020067$.

quest.name: Hoodlums Who Grabbed an Opportunity
quest.desc: $npcName:11004620$ said the Leshies insisting on driving out strangers are trying to break the peace of the forest. On the surface, it seems like they are attacking strangers. But they are actually hoodlums committing all sorts of wrong deeds. The Leshy hoodlums need to be suppressed before their group gets larger. Defeat $npcName:25022409$ in $map:02020068$ and $npcName:25022503$ in $map:02020069$.

quest.name: Reason for the Decrease of Drones
quest.desc: $npc:11004574$ said they lack parts and had to cut back on the number of surveillance drones in operation. It's because Kharon frequently attacks and brings the drones down. The drones can be in operation if $item:30001353$ from $npcName:25022206$ flying near $map:02020066$ is used. Go to $map:02020066$, defeat $npcName:25022206$, and get $item:30001353$.

quest.name: A Brilliant Way to Get Aetherine
quest.desc: $npc:11004574$ said they are always in need of aetherine because there is only 1 aetherine fusion device in $map:02020066$. The lack of aetherine can be resolved if $item:30001354$ is removed from the magic wand of $npcName:25022204$ stationed nearby. Go to $map:02020066$, suppress $npcName:25022204$, and get $item:30001354$.

quest.name: Sly Kidnapping
quest.desc: $npc:11004574$ said Kharon's kidnapping season is back. When the kidnapped people become weak and useless, they resume their large scale kidnapping again. $npc:11004574$ is sad that three refugees who went hunting today didn't return. Can't sit by and see more victims. Go to $map:02020067$ and defeat $npcName:25022300$ kidnapping refugees.

quest.name: Those Worse than Monsters
quest.desc: $npc:11004574$ said $npcNamePlural:25022306$ are having fun getting the refugees hurt. They are monsters torturing people as if killing bugs for fun. You can't let this happen. Go to $map:02020067$ and suppress $npcName:25022306$ throwing knives at the refugees.

quest.name: Cudgel of the Leshies
quest.desc: $npc:11004620$ refused the Humanitas forces stationing in $map:02020069$. He also refused the modern weapons from Humanitas to protect the mysterious power. All that's left is to improve the uncouth cudgel of the Leshies into a powerful weapon. It can become a powerful weapon if you embed it with $item:30001355$. Go to $map:02020068$, defeat $npcName:25022403$, and get $item:30001355$.

quest.name: Besieged $map:02020069$
quest.desc: $npc:11004620$ said he already knows about the lifeforms besieging $map:02020069$. Those lifeforms were encroached by the Daemon Army. $npc:11004620$ said he's certain the Daemon Army is controlling the lifeforms to steal the mysterious power.You can't let the mysterious power fall into the hands of the Daemon Army. Suppress $npcName:25022502$ threatening $map:02020069$.

quest.name: Those Who Muddy the Waters
quest.desc: $npc:11004620$ said Leshy hoodlums are going around in groups committing all sorts of wrong deeds. They trouble good Leshies and steal things. The mood in $map:02020069$ is chaotic because of them. If left alone, <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> will become uncontrollable. Teach $npcName:25022503$ roaming around $map:02020069$ a lesson.

quest.name: Insane Kharon
quest.desc: $npc:11004574$ said the Kharon forces started throwing grenades when the attack on $map:02020066$ failed. It seems they're trying to destroy $map:02020066$ out of hatred. If left alone, the infrastructure of $map:02020066$ will take a hit. Defeat $npcName:25022205$ throwing grenades at $map:02020066$.

quest.name: Dark Conspiracy
quest.desc: $npc:11004574$ thinks the Daemon Army increased their forces to taint $map:02020067$ black. They don't usually attack the refugees, but they attack without mercy if those that went out hunting come near. For now, it's best to go and see what the Daemon Army is plotting. Go to $map:02020067$ and suppress $npcName:25022304$.

quest.name: Pain and Poverty
quest.desc: $npc:11004574$ said it's too late to rescue the kidnapped refugees because they would be doing forced labor by now at the Kharon base. $npc:11004574$ they are severely lacking food because the refugees that went hunting have been kidnapped. Go to $map:02020067$, defeat $npcName:25022307$, and get $item:30001360$.

quest.name: Dark Insanity
quest.desc: $npc:11004620$ said $npcName:25022402$ is attacking the Leshies. He said many Leshies are injured by the poisonous sap spurted everywhere by $npcName:25022402$. $npc:11004620$ said $npcName:25022402$'s mind broke down after it was encroached by the dark power. Before the damage gets worse, go to $map:02020068$ and suppress $npcName:25022402$.

quest.name: A Sacred Request
quest.desc: $npc:11004620$ wants you to help repair the temple. $item:30001361$ is needed to repair the walls. Go to $map:02020068$, defeat $npcName:25022405$, and get $item:30001361$.

quest.name: Fatal Hunting Method
quest.desc: $npc:11004620$ said the ecological disturbance near $map:02020069$ is due to $npcName:25022504$'s pollen. Animals hallucinate and lose their sense of direction when $npcName:25022504$'s pollen enters their eyes. $npc:11004620$ said the damage to the animals isn't small as $npcName:25022504$ increased in numbers. Go to $map:02020069$ and restore the ecology by reducing the number of $npcName:25022504$.

quest.name: Crude Conspiracy
quest.desc: $npc:11004620$ said the Leshy hoodlums captured $npcName:25022505$ and released it in $map:02020069$. While the Leshies flee from $npcName:25022505$, they come and steal. If nothing is done, $map:02020069$ will fall into great confusion. Destroy $npcName:25022505$ going through $map:02020069$.

quest.name: Kharon's Psychological Warfare
quest.desc: $npc:11004574$ said $npcName:25022207$ used a dagger to carve out all sorts of threats around Galan. The threat was Galan will be burned to the ground if they didn't surrender voluntarily within a week. $npc:11004574$ said the refugees are in a state of confusion, breaking the rules and doing whatever they want. If this goes on, Galan will collapse from within. Defeat $npcName:25022207$ near $map:02020066$ instigating this fear.

quest.name: Threatened Refugees
quest.desc: $npc:11004574$ said the refugees that went hunting near Galan were attacked by mechanical lifeforms. They are attacking the refugees for no reason with their frightening pincers. If nothing is done, Galan will collapse from injury and hunger. Defeat $npcName:25022203$ wandering $map:02020066$.

quest.name: A Way to Cool the Heat
quest.desc: $npc:11004574$ said $map:02020066$ is boiling from the heat. She said getting the wings of $npcName:25022305$ flying around $map:02020067$ will be helpful. It's because $item:30001363$ of $npcName:25022305$ is useful as a shade since it blocks the burning light. Go to $map:02020067$, defeat $npcName:25022305$, and get $item:30001363$.

quest.name: The Brightest of Ideas
quest.desc: Modern weapons and military training were offered for the security of $map:02020069$, but $npc:11004620$ refused. Kanturang said Leshies will fight with their own weapon. The only thing that's left is to upgrade the uncout cudgel of the Leshies into a powerful one. Sticking $item:30001365$ from $npcName:25022507$ into the cudgel will make it a powerful weapon. Defeat $npcName:25022507$ living around $map:02020069$ and get $item:30001365$.

quest.name: Resting Area of the Mysterious Power
quest.desc: $npc:11004620$ said Leshies are working together to repair the temple where the 'mysterious power' is enshrined. He asked you to get $item:30001366$ in order to repair the murals. Defeat $npcName:25022501$ living near $map:02020069$ to get $item:30001366$.

quest.name: Persistent Insanity
quest.desc: $npc:11004620$ said the Daemon Army in $map:02020068$ built up their forces not too long ago. He said the Daemon Army built up their forces to contaminate the entirety of $map:02020068$. The built up force is $npcName:25022400$. If his prediction is correct, Kanturang said $map:02020068$ will soon be encroached whole by the dark power. Go to $map:02020068$ and defeat $npcName:25022400$ to stop the contamination of the forest.

quest.name: Nuisance of $map:02020069$
quest.desc: $npc:11004620$ is lacking food due to the animals released by the Daemon Army. The Leshies lack food because $npcName:25022401$ is devouring all the fruits in $map:02020068$. You can't stand the Leshy children going hungry. Go to $map:02020068$ and defeat $npcName:25022401$.
